  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Émission de rayonnement des substances radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation emission from radioactive substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung Emission von den radioaktiven 
Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emissão da radiação das substâncias 
radioativas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Emissione di radiazione dalle sostanze 
radioattive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπομπή ακτινοβολίας από τις ραδιενεργές ουσίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emisión de la radiación de sustancias 
radiactivas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre différentes choses que vous pouvez faire aux substances radioactives pour voir ce qui arrive à la quantité de rayonnement qu'il émettra.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows different things you can do to radioactive substances to see what happens to the amount radiation it will emit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se cassant</string>
            <string language="en">breaking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se refroidissant</string>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dissolution</string>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">chauffant</string>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">substances radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">Radioactive substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt unterschiedliche Sachen, 
die Sie zu den radioaktiven Substanzen tun können, um zu sehen, was 
der Menge Strahlung geschieht es ausstrahlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra coisas que diferentes 
você pode fazer às substâncias radioativas para ver o que acontece 
à radiação de uma quantidade se emitirá.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le cose che 
differenti potete fare alle sostanze radioattive per vedere che cosa 
accade alla radiazione di quantità emetterà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διαφορετικά πράγματα 
μπορείτε να κάνετε στις ραδιενεργές ουσίες για να δείτε
τι συμβαίνει στην ακτινοβολία ποσού που θα εκπέμψει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra diversas cosas que usted 
puede hacer a las sustancias radiactivas para ver qué sucede a la 
radiación de la cantidad emitirá.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auflösen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktive Substanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quebrar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refrigerar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dissolver-se</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substâncias radioativas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rompersi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raffreddamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dissoluzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sostanze radioattive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σπάσιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ψύξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάλυση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέρμανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργές ουσίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el romperse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el refrescarse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el disolver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sustancias radiactivas</string>
          </keyword>
